rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 23 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:20 PM, 15 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Zambales, Bataan, Tarlac, Metro Manila, Rizal and Bulacan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Cavite(General Trias, Trece Martires, Tanza, Naic, Maragondon, Ternate, Magallanes) and Batangas(Nasugbu) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
